reviewText: My niece raves these movies are awesome. Shes read the books and now wanted movies so I got them for her. Shes happy so Im happy
Not sure why this franchise didn't catch on better than it did... too bad. I'd enjoy seeing more of these.
Great movie and the grandkids loved them
They were good movies. But there were so many more books I wish they would make more movies.
12 yr old loves it and so do I now

As a fan of the books i decided to get the movies and although they were ok movies they do stray quite a bit from the book.
If you have never read the books you may like this but personally was disappointed in how much they modified the storyline.

My students and I REALLY expected a movie that would be more in line with the novel than this was, but it gave a great back ground for a compare/contrast essay on the similarities and differences between the book and the movie.

The writing on the packaging is in French, but the movie is in English. Ill be using this movie as a wrap up to the novel for many years.
Movie was a gift for my daughter. She loved it. She is reading the book series as well.
